name: Composite Spear
description: The Composite Spear is an upgrade to theTitanium Spearthat deals more damage and is cheaper to craft once Composites can be crafted. DespiteCompositesbeing a hefty tech investment, the Composite Spear has the highest damage output and durability outside ofPrometheusexclusive Spears. Unlike theComposite Javelin, the Composite Spear cannot be thrown.
